name: Neon Team
description:
A fun Local 2 Player game. Work together to defeat a ton of enemies!  This game might not update the borders if you go in fullscreen mode. im sorry for that. One player controlls with WASD(Blue) and the other one plays with the Arrow Keys(Red). More and more enemies are comming! prepare for an attack.

thanks again for shirobon for letting me use his song "FOX"
